query: professional user profile icon flat vector blue minimalist

llm_score.explanation: The image aligns perfectly with the search query and prompt. It represents a clean, flat vector style suitable for a professional avatar. llm_score.caption: A minimalist flat vector icon of a professional male avatar featuring brown hair, a dark grey suit, and an orange tie set against a circular light blue background.
